meanings.definition: The quality or state of being steamy.
meanings.sent1: The steaminess of the sauna made it a relaxing place to unwind.
meanings.sent2: The steaminess of the bathroom after a hot shower was comforting.
meanings.sent3: The steaminess of the kitchen made the glasses fog up comically.
meanings.sent4: The steaminess of the jungle enveloped them like a warm, damp blanket.
meanings.sent5: The steaminess of the tea kettle created a cozy atmosphere in the room.

meanings.definition: The presence of steam or moisture in the air.
meanings.sent1: The steaminess in the bathroom indicated a hot shower was taken.
meanings.sent2: The steaminess from the pot on the stove filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The steaminess in the greenhouse kept the plants happy and thriving.
meanings.sent4: The steaminess of the fog made it hard to see more than a few feet ahead.
meanings.sent5: The steaminess of the rainforest created a mystical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A feeling of sexual excitement or sensuality.
meanings.sent1: The steaminess between the characters in the movie was palpable.
meanings.sent2: The steaminess of the romance novel left readers blushing.
meanings.sent3: The steaminess of the love scene in the play had the audience giggling.
meanings.sent4: The steaminess of their chemistry sizzled like a hot skillet.
meanings.sent5: The steaminess of their gaze across the room was electrifying.
